script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_tag_sub_sub_sectors; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_tag_sub_sub_sectors AS SELECT a.amp_activity_id, COALESCE(level.name, '#') AS name, asl.id2 AS amp_sector_id, SUM(a.sector_percentage) as percentage FROM amp_activity_sector a JOIN ni_all_sectors_with_levels asl ON a.amp_sector_id = asl.amp_sector_id LEFT JOIN amp_sector level ON level.amp_sector_id = asl.id2 JOIN amp_classification_config acc ON acc.id = a.classification_config_id WHERE acc.name = 'Tag' GROUP BY a.amp_activity_id, asl.id2, level.amp_sector_id;
